divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside smoking a ciggatte like always. i always look at the sky when i saw this star moving i was freaking out i couldnt belive it then it meade a quick shrap turn like an L then it started to fade away as it was fading away it turned orange getting smaller an an smaller till it was gone i tried to take a picture but it happend so fast.
Summary: it look just like a star then it faded away
